en.title: Self-check on expression
en.prompt: After [a specific action], I said: [my response]. How might the other person interpret my meaning?
en.remark: If you belong to the highly sensitive population or if your words are frequently misunderstood, using AI interpretation can help you self-check before speaking to ensure clear expression.

metaDescription: Worried your words might be misunderstood? This prompt helps you self-check your expressions. Tell the AI what you said, and it will analyze how others might interpret it.
